website_summaries.verdict: Faux leather case from a known brand and at a great price point.
pros: Smaller case that’s a great size for traveling and holds the essentials
Huge center tray for larger items
Good for kids, as it also works well as a craft box
cons: Comes in several colors and prints, and it seems random which one you'll receive

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold much at all
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute, but way too small! Only giving it one star because we love the color. We have the old school plastic caboodle with the mirror and that fits more than this train case. I may return it or keep it for my daughter's jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I was anticipating
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great product and I consider it money well spent. However, it was a little smaller than I anticipated so I did not use it for what I intended too. I was able to use it for something else and it ended up working out better anyway! Great buy at a low price!
customer_reviews.author: KLP

customer_reviews.title: Just ok but wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The trays on the inside don’t pop up like they should. Smaller than what I thought when I ordered it. My urban decay palettes don’t fit in it without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: High quality and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Super cute caboodle perfect for holding everything I have for special effects makeup. The compartments help with space and efficiency. Super durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Initially thought the gift bag was lost but I found it. All is well with this, just could have been more tissue gift paper for cushion..it was a bit skimpy. Overall, though, sweet. Amazon side note: I am awaiting a paint sample refund of 4.99 plus tax that claims to have been refunded. Initially I wanted it replaced but they’ve removed the option. I didn’t get the refund yet. You've been doing awesome, Amazon, especially during this global crisis. You're amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Small & well made
customer_reviews.text: Cute case for my young teen. This is certainly not for a professional who applies makeup for multiple people, but ideal for one person who has a reasonable amount of makeup and applicators. We also appreciate the lock to keep her 4 year old sister from getting into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Should have invested in a better one. Broke after just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but a little smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne embry

customer_reviews.title: Makeup case gift of choice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her makeup to take for dance competition she loved it and will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Dornseif

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very beautiful case, it just wasn’t big enough for what I wanted to use it for but can store lots of makeup and supplies
customer_reviews.author: MKG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily makeup
customer_reviews.text: So cute. It fits almost every that I mostly need on a daily basis.(for more natural look) Super cute I like the shelves
customer_reviews.author: Ally  customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. She had to wear make-up for dance competitions. This size is perfect, it's very sturdy, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than photo leads you to believe. Cute for a child. Bought for my niece to hold her b ad ok polish.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Compact yet spacious, cute and great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and fits a lot of my things. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: alsatian5

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with the makeup box. It’s extremely smaller than expected. Quality is cheap definitely not worth 30$ 😕
customer_reviews.author: Milah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: One came in a box and one didn’t. Sortof strange. But both good quality and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup case!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters dance competition and it definitely held up! Great product and plenty of space for all makeup and even came with a key if we wanted to lock it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this makeup case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this caboodle case! I bought it for my trip to Nashville and it carried everything I need and more! Nothing broke and everything stayed secure!
customer_reviews.author: Lue M.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice, however it's too small, I was expecting it to be much bigger. None of my pallets can fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for a preteen. I put a bunch of hair accessories and some jewelry in it. She loved the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel De Amicis

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I love this caboodle. Needed something to fit all my needs. Plus the color is perfect rose gold.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, a little smaller than I imagined, but it does the job. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smaller than I was thinking, even after reading dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Make-up Case
customer_reviews.text: When my last Caboodles case eventually broke, after years of use and abuse, I looked for a replacement in the stores unsuccessfully. This one, from Amazon, is almost identical to the one I loved. I think of it as a small toolbox. The classic design is perfect, and I'll replace it again with the same type when it breaks, many years from now!
customer_reviews.author: Judith952

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this it's so cute! And a great price. You can really fit a ton of stuff in it for the size it is. Obviously this is not a giant one so if you need more organizing pay attention to size and price, the cheapest of those big ones is like $60. You will not find one for $20. But like I said it fits soooo much stuff in it still. And because of the size it's great to travel with. I still probably have at least 80 items in it even though it's a little packed now, it's still manageable. And the color is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Greta Gift
customer_reviews.text: Train Case was gift for my 13 year old granddaughter, who is just beginning to wear makeup. She was thrilled with the case. From purchasing this brand previously, felt the quality was good and she will be able to use it for along time.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Gardner

customer_reviews.title: It was nice but too small
customer_reviews.text: For the things I wanted to put in it and organize it was much to small. Very pretty and sturdy but too small
customer_reviews.author: KRenee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome little case
customer_reviews.text: I used this for make up since my kiddos get into EVERYTHING. It locks and stays locked (don't lose the keys)
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but was expecting it to hold more items. The trays are pretty small
customer_reviews.author: Z Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: This holds all my nail supplies nicely. It is pretty good quality except when you open it one of the metal arms doesnt extend smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: KatieSponberger

product_meta.title: Caboodles Adored 4-tray Train Case, Includes Locking Latch with Keys, 3 Pound
product_meta.description: This is the train case that leaves you feeling loved, prized and Adored. Plenty of places and spaces to put your beauty treasures will keep you looking your best, but more importantly, feeling good about yourself You're worth it We designed these professional-level cases for the most serious of cosmetic organizers -aka the makeup fanatics with too many shades of eyeshadow to count. Sturdy yet light and stylish, train cases fit it all with multi-tiered levels and roomy storage. Features: 4 Auto-Open Trays, Spacious interior storage, and locking latch with keys
feature_bullets: Color: Muted metallic rose gold closed dimensions: 8.5"x 6.37"x 6.62"
Lockable latch with keys; Faux leather
Perfect case size for a weekend get away

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
